title: Instagram Scraper Input
description: Input for the Instagram Scraper Actor

directUrls.title: Instagram URLs you want to scrape
directUrls.description: Add one or more Instagram URLs to scrape. The field is optional, but you need to either use this field or search query below.

resultsType.title: What do you want to scrape from each page?
resultsType.description: You can choose to get posts, comments or details from Instagram URLs. Comments can only be scraped from post URLs.

resultsLimit.title: Max results per URL
resultsLimit.description: How many posts or comments (max 50 comments per post) you want to scrape from each Instagram URL. If you set this to 1, you will get a single post from each page.

onlyPostsNewerThan.title: Newer than
onlyPostsNewerThan.description: Limit how far back to the history the scraper should go. The date should be in YYYY-MM-DD or full ISO absolute format or in relative format e.g. 1 days, 2 months, 3 years. All time values are taken in UTC timezone

isUserTaggedFeedURL.title: Tagged posts
isUserTaggedFeedURL.description: Get the tagged posts for each profile

isUserReelFeedURL.title: Reels posts
isUserReelFeedURL.description: Get the reels posts for each profile

search.title: Search query
search.description: Provide a search query which will be used to search Instagram for profiles, hashtags or places.

searchType.title: Search type
searchType.description: What type of pages to search for (you can look for hashtags, profiles or places).

searchLimit.title: Search results limit
searchLimit.description: How many search results (hashtags, users or places) should be returned.

enhanceUserSearchWithFacebookPage.title: Enhance user search (top 10) with Facebook page & email if available (higher credit usage)
enhanceUserSearchWithFacebookPage.description: For each user from the top 10, the scraper extracts their Facebook page that sometimes contains their business email.

addParentData.title: Add metadata
addParentData.description: Only for feed items - add data source to results, i.e. for profile posts metadata is profile, for tag posts metadata is hashtag
